Reference

'WhiteboxTools' R Reference

General

check_whitebox_binary()

Check for 'WhiteboxTools' executable path

wbt_install() install_whitebox() wbt_install_extension()

Download and Install 'WhiteboxTools'

sample_dem_data()

Convenience method for path to sample DEM

wbt_activate()

Activate 'WhiteboxTools' Extensions

wbt_help()

Help description for 'WhiteboxTools'

wbt_init() wbt_options() wbt_exe_path() wbt_default_path() wbt_data_dir() wbt_wd() wbt_verbose() wbt_compress_rasters() wbt_max_procs()

Initialize 'WhiteboxTools'

wbt_license()

License information for 'WhiteboxTools'

wbt_list_tools()

All available tools in 'WhiteboxTools'

wbt_run_tool()

Run a tool in 'WhiteboxTools' by name

wbt_rust_backtrace()

Convenience method for setting RUST_BACKTRACE options for debugging

wbt_tool_help()

Help description for a specific tool in 'WhiteboxTools'

wbt_tool_parameters()

Tool parameter descriptions for a specific tool in 'WhiteboxTools'

wbt_toolbox()

The toolbox for a specific tool in WhiteboxTools

wbt_version()

Version information for 'WhiteboxTools'

wbt_view_code()

Source code for a specific tool in 'WhiteboxTools'

wbttoolparameters

'WhiteboxTools' Tool Parameters

wbttools

'WhiteboxTools' Tool List

Data Tools

wbt_add_point_coordinates_to_table()

Add point coordinates to table Modifies the attribute table of a point vector by adding fields containing each point's X and Y coordinates.

wbt_clean_vector()

Clean vector Removes null features and lines/polygons with fewer than the required number of vertices.

wbt_convert_nodata_to_zero()

Convert nodata to zero Converts nodata values in a raster to zero.

wbt_convert_raster_format()

Convert raster format Converts raster data from one format to another.

wbt_csv_points_to_vector()

Csv points to vector Converts a CSV text file to vector points.

wbt_export_table_to_csv()

Export table to csv Exports an attribute table to a CSV text file.

wbt_fix_dangling_arcs()

Fix dangling arcs This tool fixes undershot and overshot arcs, two common topological errors, in an input vector lines file.

wbt_join_tables()

Join tables Merge a vector's attribute table with another table based on a common field.

wbt_lines_to_polygons()

Lines to polygons Converts vector polylines to polygons.

wbt_merge_table_with_csv()

Merge table with csv Merge a vector's attribute table with a table contained within a CSV text file.

wbt_merge_vectors()

Merge vectors Combines two or more input vectors of the same ShapeType creating a single, new output vector.

wbt_modify_no_data_value()

Modify no data value Converts nodata values in a raster to zero.

wbt_multi_part_to_single_part()

Multi part to single part Converts a vector file containing multi-part features into a vector containing only single-part features.

wbt_new_raster_from_base()

New raster from base Creates a new raster using a base image.

wbt_polygons_to_lines()

Polygons to lines Converts vector polygons to polylines.

wbt_print_geo_tiff_tags()

Print geo tiff tags Prints the tags within a GeoTIFF.

wbt_raster_to_vector_lines()

Raster to vector lines Converts a raster lines features into a vector of the POLYLINE shapetype.

wbt_raster_to_vector_points()

Raster to vector points Converts a raster dataset to a vector of the POINT shapetype.

wbt_raster_to_vector_polygons()

Raster to vector polygons Converts a raster dataset to a vector of the POLYGON shapetype.

wbt_reinitialize_attribute_table()

Reinitialize attribute table Reinitializes a vector's attribute table deleting all fields but the feature ID (FID).

wbt_remove_polygon_holes()

Remove polygon holes Removes holes within the features of a vector polygon file.

wbt_set_nodata_value()

Set nodata value Assign a specified value in an input image to the NoData value.

wbt_single_part_to_multi_part()

Single part to multi part Converts a vector file containing multi-part features into a vector containing only single-part features.

wbt_vector_lines_to_raster()

Vector lines to raster Converts a vector containing polylines into a raster.

wbt_vector_points_to_raster()

Vector points to raster Converts a vector containing points into a raster.

wbt_vector_polygons_to_raster()

Vector polygons to raster Converts a vector containing polygons into a raster.

GIS Analysis

wbt_aggregate_raster()

Aggregate raster Aggregates a raster to a lower resolution.

wbt_block_maximum_gridding()

Block maximum gridding Creates a raster grid based on a set of vector points and assigns grid values using a block maximum scheme.

wbt_block_minimum_gridding()

Block minimum gridding Creates a raster grid based on a set of vector points and assigns grid values using a block minimum scheme.

wbt_centroid()

Centroid Calculates the centroid, or average location, of raster polygon objects.

wbt_centroid_vector()

Centroid vector Identifies the centroid point of a vector polyline or polygon feature or a group of vector points.

wbt_clump()

Clump Groups cells that form discrete areas, assigning them unique identifiers.

wbt_construct_vector_tin()

Construct vector tin Creates a vector triangular irregular network (TIN) for a set of vector points.

wbt_create_hexagonal_vector_grid()

Create hexagonal vector grid Creates a hexagonal vector grid.

wbt_create_plane()

Create plane Creates a raster image based on the equation for a simple plane.

wbt_create_rectangular_vector_grid()

Create rectangular vector grid Creates a rectangular vector grid.

wbt_dissolve()

Dissolve Removes the interior, or shared, boundaries within a vector polygon coverage.

wbt_eliminate_coincident_points()

Eliminate coincident points Removes any coincident, or nearly coincident, points from a vector points file.

wbt_extend_vector_lines()

Extend vector lines Extends vector lines by a specified distance.

wbt_extract_nodes()

Extract nodes Converts vector lines or polygons into vertex points.

wbt_extract_raster_values_at_points()

Extract raster values at points Extracts the values of raster(s) at vector point locations.

wbt_filter_raster_features_by_area()

Filter raster features by area Removes small-area features from a raster.

wbt_find_lowest_or_highest_points()

Find lowest or highest points Locates the lowest and/or highest valued cells in a raster.

wbt_heat_map()

Heat map This tool calculates a heat map, or kernel density estimation (KDE), for an input point set.

wbt_idw_interpolation()

Idw interpolation Interpolates vector points into a raster surface using an inverse-distance weighted scheme.

wbt_layer_footprint()

Layer footprint Creates a vector polygon footprint of the area covered by a raster grid or vector layer.

wbt_medoid()

Medoid Calculates the medoid for a series of vector features contained in a shapefile.

wbt_minimum_bounding_box()

Minimum bounding box Creates a vector minimum bounding rectangle around vector features.

wbt_minimum_bounding_circle()

Minimum bounding circle Delineates the minimum bounding circle (i.e. smallest enclosing circle) for a group of vectors.

wbt_minimum_bounding_envelope()

Minimum bounding envelope Creates a vector axis-aligned minimum bounding rectangle (envelope) around vector features.

wbt_minimum_convex_hull()

Minimum convex hull Creates a vector convex polygon around vector features.

wbt_natural_neighbour_interpolation()

Natural neighbour interpolation Creates a raster grid based on Sibson's natural neighbour method.

wbt_nearest_neighbour_gridding()

Nearest neighbour gridding Creates a raster grid based on a set of vector points and assigns grid values using the nearest neighbour.

wbt_polygon_area()

Polygon area Calculates the area of vector polygons.

wbt_polygon_long_axis()

Polygon long axis This tool can be used to map the long axis of polygon features.

wbt_polygon_perimeter()

Polygon perimeter Calculates the perimeter of vector polygons.

wbt_polygon_short_axis()

Polygon short axis This tool can be used to map the short axis of polygon features.

wbt_radial_basis_function_interpolation()

Radial basis function interpolation Interpolates vector points into a raster surface using a radial basis function scheme.

wbt_raster_area()

Raster area Calculates the area of polygons or classes within a raster image.

wbt_raster_cell_assignment()

Raster cell assignment Assign row or column number to cells.

wbt_raster_perimeter()

Raster perimeter Calculates the perimeters of polygons or classes within a raster image.

wbt_reclass()

Reclass Reclassifies the values in a raster image.

wbt_reclass_equal_interval()

Reclass equal interval Reclassifies the values in a raster image based on equal-ranges.

wbt_reclass_from_file()

Reclass from file Reclassifies the values in a raster image using reclass ranges in a text file.

wbt_smooth_vectors()

Smooth vectors Smooths a vector coverage of either a POLYLINE or POLYGON base ShapeType.

wbt_split_vector_lines()

Split vector lines This tool can be used to split a vector line coverage into even-lengthed segments.

wbt_tin_gridding()

Tin gridding Creates a raster grid based on a triangular irregular network (TIN) fitted to vector points.

wbt_travelling_salesman_problem()

Travelling salesman problem This tool finds approximate solutions to travelling salesman problems, the goal of which is to identify the shortest route connecting a set of locations.

wbt_vector_hex_binning()

Vector hex binning Hex-bins a set of vector points.

wbt_voronoi_diagram()

Voronoi diagram Creates a vector Voronoi diagram for a set of vector points.

GIS Analysis (Distance)

wbt_buffer_raster()

Buffer raster Maps a distance-based buffer around each non-background (non-zero/non-nodata) grid cell in an input image.

wbt_cost_allocation()

Cost allocation Identifies the source cell to which each grid cell is connected by a least-cost pathway in a cost-distance analysis.

wbt_cost_distance()

Cost distance Performs cost-distance accumulation on a cost surface and a group of source cells.

wbt_cost_pathway()

Cost pathway Performs cost-distance pathway analysis using a series of destination grid cells.

wbt_euclidean_allocation()

Euclidean allocation Assigns grid cells in the output raster the value of the nearest target cell in the input image, measured by the Shih and Wu (2004) Euclidean distance transform.

wbt_euclidean_distance()

Euclidean distance Calculates the Shih and Wu (2004) Euclidean distance transform.

GIS Analysis (Overlay)

wbt_average_overlay()

Average overlay Calculates the average for each grid cell from a group of raster images.

wbt_clip()

Clip Extract all the features, or parts of features, that overlap with the features of the clip vector.

wbt_clip_raster_to_polygon()

Clip raster to polygon Clips a raster to a vector polygon.

wbt_count_if()

Count if Counts the number of occurrences of a specified value in a cell-stack of rasters.

wbt_difference()

Difference Outputs the features that occur in one of the two vector inputs but not both, i.e. no overlapping features.

wbt_erase()

Erase Removes all the features, or parts of features, that overlap with the features of the erase vector polygon.

wbt_erase_polygon_from_raster()

Erase polygon from raster Erases (cuts out) a vector polygon from a raster.

wbt_highest_position()

Highest position Identifies the stack position of the maximum value within a raster stack on a cell-by-cell basis.

wbt_intersect()

Intersect Identifies the parts of features in common between two input vector layers.

wbt_line_intersections()

Line intersections Identifies points where the features of two vector line layers intersect.

wbt_lowest_position()

Lowest position Identifies the stack position of the minimum value within a raster stack on a cell-by-cell basis.

wbt_max_absolute_overlay()

Max absolute overlay Evaluates the maximum absolute value for each grid cell from a stack of input rasters.

wbt_max_overlay()

Max overlay Evaluates the maximum value for each grid cell from a stack of input rasters.

wbt_merge_line_segments()

Merge line segments Merges vector line segments into larger features.

wbt_min_absolute_overlay()

Min absolute overlay Evaluates the minimum absolute value for each grid cell from a stack of input rasters.

wbt_min_overlay()

Min overlay Evaluates the minimum value for each grid cell from a stack of input rasters.

wbt_multiply_overlay()

Multiply overlay Calculates the sum for each grid cell from a group of raster images.

wbt_percent_equal_to()

Percent equal to Calculates the percentage of a raster stack that have cell values equal to an input on a cell-by-cell basis.

wbt_percent_greater_than()

Percent greater than Calculates the percentage of a raster stack that have cell values greater than an input on a cell-by-cell basis.

wbt_percent_less_than()

Percent less than Calculates the percentage of a raster stack that have cell values less than an input on a cell-by-cell basis.

wbt_pick_from_list()

Pick from list Outputs the value from a raster stack specified by a position raster.

wbt_polygonize()

Polygonize Creates a polygon layer from two or more intersecting line features contained in one or more input vector line files.

wbt_split_with_lines()

Split with lines Splits the lines or polygons in one layer using the lines in another layer.

wbt_sum_overlay()

Sum overlay Calculates the sum for each grid cell from a group of raster images.

wbt_symmetrical_difference()

Symmetrical difference Outputs the features that occur in one of the two vector inputs but not both, i.e. no overlapping features.

wbt_union()

Union Splits vector layers at their overlaps, creating a layer containing all the portions from both input and overlay layers.

wbt_update_nodata_cells()

Update nodata cells Replaces the NoData values in an input raster with the corresponding values contained in a second update layer.

wbt_weighted_overlay()

Weighted overlay Performs a weighted sum on multiple input rasters after converting each image to a common scale. The tool performs a multi-criteria evaluation (MCE).

wbt_weighted_sum()

Weighted sum Performs a weighted-sum overlay on multiple input raster images.

GIS Analysis (Patch Shape)

wbt_boundary_shape_complexity()

Boundary shape complexity Calculates the complexity of the boundaries of raster polygons.

wbt_compactness_ratio()

Compactness ratio Calculates the compactness ratio (A/P), a measure of shape complexity, for vector polygons.

wbt_edge_proportion()

Edge proportion Calculate the proportion of cells in a raster polygon that are edge cells.

wbt_elongation_ratio()

Elongation ratio Calculates the elongation ratio for vector polygons.

wbt_find_patch_or_class_edge_cells()

Find patch or class edge cells Finds all cells located on the edge of patch or class features.

wbt_hole_proportion()

Hole proportion Calculates the proportion of the total area of a polygon's holes relative to the area of the polygon's hull.

wbt_linearity_index()

Linearity index Calculates the linearity index for vector polygons.

wbt_narrowness_index()

Narrowness index Calculates the narrowness of raster polygons.

wbt_patch_orientation()

Patch orientation Calculates the orientation of vector polygons.

wbt_perimeter_area_ratio()

Perimeter area ratio Calculates the perimeter-area ratio of vector polygons.

wbt_radius_of_gyration()

Radius of gyration Calculates the distance of cells from their polygon's centroid.

wbt_related_circumscribing_circle()

Related circumscribing circle Calculates the related circumscribing circle of vector polygons.

wbt_shape_complexity_index()

Shape complexity index Calculates overall polygon shape complexity or irregularity.

wbt_shape_complexity_index_raster()

Shape complexity index raster Calculates the complexity of raster polygons or classes.

Geomorphometric Analysis

wbt_accumulation_curvature()

Accumulation curvature This tool calculates accumulation curvature from an input DEM.

wbt_aspect()

Aspect Calculates an aspect raster from an input DEM.

wbt_assess_route()

Assess route This tool assesses a route for slope, elevation, and visibility variation.

wbt_average_normal_vector_angular_deviation()

Average normal vector angular deviation Calculates the circular variance of aspect at a scale for a DEM.

wbt_breakline_mapping()

Breakline mapping This tool maps breaklines from an input DEM.

wbt_circular_variance_of_aspect()

Circular variance of aspect Calculates the circular variance of aspect at a scale for a DEM.

wbt_contours_from_points()

Contours from points Creates a contour coverage from a set of input points.

wbt_contours_from_raster()

Contours from raster Derives a vector contour coverage from a raster surface.

wbt_curvedness()

Curvedness This tool calculates curvedness from an input DEM.

wbt_dev_from_mean_elev()

Dev from mean elev Calculates deviation from mean elevation.

wbt_diff_from_mean_elev()

Diff from mean elev Calculates difference from mean elevation (equivalent to a high-pass filter).

wbt_difference_curvature()

Difference curvature This tool calculates difference curvature from an input DEM.

wbt_directional_relief()

Directional relief Calculates relief for cells in an input DEM for a specified direction.

wbt_downslope_index()

Downslope index Calculates the Hjerdt et al. (2004) downslope index.

wbt_edge_density()

Edge density Calculates the density of edges, or breaks-in-slope within DEMs.

wbt_elev_above_pit()

Elev above pit Calculate the elevation of each grid cell above the nearest downstream pit cell or grid edge cell.

wbt_elev_percentile()

Elev percentile Calculates the elevation percentile raster from a DEM.

wbt_elev_relative_to_min_max()

Elev relative to min max Calculates the elevation of a location relative to the minimum and maximum elevations in a DEM.

wbt_elev_relative_to_watershed_min_max()

Elev relative to watershed min max Calculates the elevation of a location relative to the minimum and maximum elevations in a watershed.

wbt_embankment_mapping()

Embankment mapping Maps and/or removes road embankments from an input fine-resolution DEM.

wbt_exposure_towards_wind_flux()

Exposure towards wind flux This tool evaluates hydrologic connectivity within a DEM.

wbt_feature_preserving_smoothing()

Feature preserving smoothing Reduces short-scale variation in an input DEM using a modified Sun et al. (2007) algorithm.

wbt_fetch_analysis()

Fetch analysis Performs an analysis of fetch or upwind distance to an obstacle.

wbt_fill_missing_data()

Fill missing data Fills NoData holes in a DEM.

wbt_find_ridges()

Find ridges Identifies potential ridge and peak grid cells.

wbt_gaussian_curvature()

Gaussian curvature Calculates a mean curvature raster from an input DEM.

wbt_gaussian_scale_space()

Gaussian scale space This tool uses the fast Gaussian approximation algorithm to produce scaled land-surface parameter measurements from an input DEM.

wbt_generating_function()

Generating function This tool calculates generating function from an input DEM.

wbt_geomorphons()

Geomorphons Computes geomorphon patterns.

wbt_hillshade()

Hillshade Calculates a hillshade raster from an input DEM.

wbt_horizon_angle()

Horizon angle Calculates horizon angle (maximum upwind slope) for each grid cell in an input DEM.

wbt_horizontal_excess_curvature()

Horizontal excess curvature This tool calculates horizontal excess curvature from an input DEM.

wbt_hypsometric_analysis()

Hypsometric analysis Calculates a hypsometric curve for one or more DEMs.

wbt_hypsometrically_tinted_hillshade()

Hypsometrically tinted hillshade Creates an colour shaded relief image from an input DEM.

wbt_local_hypsometric_analysis()

Local hypsometric analysis This tool calculates a local, neighbourhood-based hypsometric integral raster.

wbt_local_quadratic_regression()

Local quadratic regression This tool is an implementation of the constrained quadratic regression algorithm using a flexible window size described in Wood (1996).

wbt_map_off_terrain_objects()

Map off terrain objects Maps off-terrain objects in a digital elevation model (DEM).

wbt_max_anisotropy_dev()

Max anisotropy dev Calculates the maximum anisotropy (directionality) in elevation deviation over a range of spatial scales.

wbt_max_anisotropy_dev_signature()

Max anisotropy dev signature Calculates the anisotropy in deviation from mean for points over a range of spatial scales.

wbt_max_branch_length()

Max branch length Lindsay and Seibert's (2013) branch length index is used to map drainage divides or ridge lines.

wbt_max_difference_from_mean()

Max difference from mean Calculates the maximum difference from mean elevation over a range of spatial scales.

wbt_max_downslope_elev_change()

Max downslope elev change Calculates the maximum downslope change in elevation between a grid cell and its eight downslope neighbors.

wbt_max_elev_dev_signature()

Max elev dev signature Calculates the maximum elevation deviation over a range of spatial scales and for a set of points.

wbt_max_elevation_deviation()

Max elevation deviation Calculates the maximum elevation deviation over a range of spatial scales.

wbt_max_upslope_elev_change()

Max upslope elev change Calculates the maximum upslope change in elevation between a grid cell and its eight downslope neighbors.

wbt_maximal_curvature()

Maximal curvature Calculates a mean curvature raster from an input DEM.

wbt_mean_curvature()

Mean curvature Calculates a mean curvature raster from an input DEM.

wbt_min_downslope_elev_change()

Min downslope elev change Calculates the minimum downslope change in elevation between a grid cell and its eight downslope neighbors.

wbt_minimal_curvature()

Minimal curvature Calculates a mean curvature raster from an input DEM.

wbt_multidirectional_hillshade()

Multidirectional hillshade Calculates a multi-direction hillshade raster from an input DEM.

wbt_multiscale_elevation_percentile()

Multiscale elevation percentile Calculates surface roughness over a range of spatial scales.

wbt_multiscale_roughness()

Multiscale roughness Calculates surface roughness over a range of spatial scales.

wbt_multiscale_roughness_signature()

Multiscale roughness signature Calculates the surface roughness for points over a range of spatial scales.

wbt_multiscale_std_dev_normals()

Multiscale std dev normals Calculates surface roughness over a range of spatial scales.

wbt_multiscale_std_dev_normals_signature()

Multiscale std dev normals signature Calculates the surface roughness for points over a range of spatial scales.

wbt_multiscale_topographic_position_image()

Multiscale topographic position image Creates a multiscale topographic position image from three DEVmax rasters of differing spatial scale ranges.

wbt_num_downslope_neighbours()

Num downslope neighbours Calculates the number of downslope neighbours to each grid cell in a DEM.

wbt_num_upslope_neighbours()

Num upslope neighbours Calculates the number of upslope neighbours to each grid cell in a DEM.

wbt_openness()

Openness This tool calculates the topographic openness index from an input DEM.

wbt_pennock_landform_class()

Pennock landform class Classifies hillslope zones based on slope, profile curvature, and plan curvature.

wbt_percent_elev_range()

Percent elev range Calculates percent of elevation range from a DEM.

wbt_plan_curvature()

Plan curvature Calculates a plan (contour) curvature raster from an input DEM.

wbt_profile()

Profile Plots profiles from digital surface models.

wbt_profile_curvature()

Profile curvature Calculates a profile curvature raster from an input DEM.

wbt_relative_aspect()

Relative aspect Calculates relative aspect (relative to a user-specified direction) from an input DEM.

wbt_relative_topographic_position()

Relative topographic position Calculates the relative topographic position index from a DEM.

wbt_remove_off_terrain_objects()

Remove off terrain objects Removes off-terrain objects from a raster digital elevation model (DEM).

wbt_ring_curvature()

Ring curvature This tool calculates ring curvature from an input DEM.

wbt_rotor()

Rotor This tool calculates rotor from an input DEM.

wbt_ruggedness_index()

Ruggedness index Calculates the Riley et al.'s (1999) terrain ruggedness index from an input DEM.

wbt_sediment_transport_index()

Sediment transport index Calculates the sediment transport index.

wbt_shadow_animation()

Shadow animation This tool creates an animated GIF of shadows based on an input DEM.

wbt_shadow_image()

Shadow image This tool creates a raster of shadow areas based on an input DEM.

wbt_shape_index()

Shape index This tool calculates the shape index from an input DEM.

wbt_slope()

Slope Calculates a slope raster from an input DEM.

wbt_slope_vs_aspect_plot()

Slope vs aspect plot This tool creates a slope-aspect relation plot from an input DEM.

wbt_slope_vs_elevation_plot()

Slope vs elevation plot Creates a slope vs. elevation plot for one or more DEMs.

wbt_smooth_vegetation_residual()

Smooth vegetation residual This tool can smooth the residual roughness due to vegetation cover in LiDAR DEMs.

wbt_spherical_std_dev_of_normals()

Spherical std dev of normals Calculates the spherical standard deviation of surface normals for a DEM.

wbt_standard_deviation_of_slope()

Standard deviation of slope Calculates the standard deviation of slope from an input DEM.

wbt_stream_power_index()

Stream power index Calculates the relative stream power index.

wbt_surface_area_ratio()

Surface area ratio Calculates a the surface area ratio of each grid cell in an input DEM.

wbt_tangential_curvature()

Tangential curvature Calculates a tangential curvature raster from an input DEM.

wbt_time_in_daylight()

Time in daylight Calculates the proportion of time a location is not within an area of shadow.

wbt_topographic_position_animation()

Topographic position animation This tool creates an animated GIF of multi-scale local topographic position (elevation deviation).

wbt_total_curvature()

Total curvature Calculates a total curvature raster from an input DEM.

wbt_unsphericity()

Unsphericity This tool calculates the unsphericity curvature from an input DEM.

wbt_vertical_excess_curvature()

Vertical excess curvature This tool calculates vertical excess curvature from an input DEM.

wbt_viewshed()

Viewshed Identifies the viewshed for a point or set of points.

wbt_visibility_index()

Visibility index Estimates the relative visibility of sites in a DEM.

wbt_wetness_index()

Wetness index Calculates the topographic wetness index, Ln(A / tan(slope)).

Hydrological Analysis

wbt_average_flowpath_slope()

Average flowpath slope Measures the average slope gradient from each grid cell to all upslope divide cells.

wbt_average_upslope_flowpath_length()

Average upslope flowpath length Measures the average length of all upslope flowpaths draining each grid cell.

wbt_basins()

Basins Identifies drainage basins that drain to the DEM edge.

wbt_breach_depressions()

Breach depressions Breaches all of the depressions in a DEM using Lindsay's (2016) algorithm. This should be preferred over depression filling in most cases.

wbt_breach_depressions_least_cost()

Breach depressions least cost Breaches the depressions in a DEM using a least-cost pathway method.

wbt_breach_single_cell_pits()

Breach single cell pits Removes single-cell pits from an input DEM by breaching.

wbt_burn_streams_at_roads()

Burn streams at roads Burns-in streams at the sites of road embankments.

wbt_d8_flow_accumulation()

D8 flow accumulation Calculates a D8 flow accumulation raster from an input DEM or flow pointer.

wbt_d8_mass_flux()

D8 mass flux Performs a D8 mass flux calculation.

wbt_d8_pointer()

D8 pointer Calculates a D8 flow pointer raster from an input DEM.

wbt_d_inf_flow_accumulation()

D inf flow accumulation Calculates a D-infinity flow accumulation raster from an input DEM.

wbt_d_inf_mass_flux()

D inf mass flux Performs a D-infinity mass flux calculation.

wbt_d_inf_pointer()

D inf pointer Calculates a D-infinity flow pointer (flow direction) raster from an input DEM.

wbt_depth_in_sink()

Depth in sink Measures the depth of sinks (depressions) in a DEM.

wbt_depth_to_water()

Depth to water This tool calculates cartographic depth-to-water (DTW) index.

wbt_downslope_distance_to_stream()

Downslope distance to stream Measures distance to the nearest downslope stream cell.

wbt_downslope_flowpath_length()

Downslope flowpath length Calculates the downslope flowpath length from each cell to basin outlet.

wbt_edge_contamination()

Edge contamination This tool identifies grid cells within an input DEM that may be impacted by edge contamination for hydrological applications.

wbt_elevation_above_stream()

Elevation above stream Calculates the elevation of cells above the nearest downslope stream cell.

wbt_elevation_above_stream_euclidean()

Elevation above stream euclidean Calculates the elevation of cells above the nearest (Euclidean distance) stream cell.

wbt_fd8_flow_accumulation()

Fd8 flow accumulation Calculates an FD8 flow accumulation raster from an input DEM.

wbt_fd8_pointer()

Fd8 pointer Calculates an FD8 flow pointer raster from an input DEM.

wbt_fill_burn()

Fill burn Burns streams into a DEM using the FillBurn (Saunders, 1999) method.

wbt_fill_depressions()

Fill depressions Fills all of the depressions in a DEM. Depression breaching should be preferred in most cases.

wbt_fill_depressions_planchon_and_darboux()

Fill depressions planchon and darboux Fills all of the depressions in a DEM using the Planchon and Darboux (2002) method.

wbt_fill_depressions_wang_and_liu()

Fill depressions wang and liu Fills all of the depressions in a DEM using the Wang and Liu (2006) method. Depression breaching should be preferred in most cases.

wbt_fill_single_cell_pits()

Fill single cell pits Raises pit cells to the elevation of their lowest neighbour.

wbt_find_no_flow_cells()

Find no flow cells Finds grid cells with no downslope neighbours.

wbt_find_parallel_flow()

Find parallel flow Finds areas of parallel flow in D8 flow direction rasters.

wbt_flatten_lakes()

Flatten lakes Flattens lake polygons in a raster DEM.

wbt_flood_order()

Flood order Assigns each DEM grid cell its order in the sequence of inundations that are encountered during a search starting from the edges, moving inward at increasing elevations.

wbt_flow_accumulation_full_workflow()

Flow accumulation full workflow Resolves all of the depressions in a DEM, outputting a breached DEM, an aspect-aligned non-divergent flow pointer, and a flow accumulation raster.

wbt_flow_length_diff()

Flow length diff Calculates the local maximum absolute difference in downslope flowpath length, useful in mapping drainage divides and ridges.

wbt_hillslopes()

Hillslopes Identifies the individual hillslopes draining to each link in a stream network.

wbt_hydrologic_connectivity()

Hydrologic connectivity This tool evaluates hydrologic connectivity within a DEM.

wbt_impoundment_size_index()

Impoundment size index Calculates the impoundment size resulting from damming a DEM.

wbt_insert_dams()

Insert dams Calculates the impoundment size resulting from damming a DEM.

wbt_isobasins()

Isobasins Divides a landscape into nearly equal sized drainage basins (i.e. watersheds).

wbt_jenson_snap_pour_points()

Jenson snap pour points Moves outlet points used to specify points of interest in a watershedding operation to the nearest stream cell.

wbt_longest_flowpath()

Longest flowpath Delineates the longest flowpaths for a group of subbasins or watersheds.

wbt_low_points_on_headwater_divides()

Low points on headwater divides This tool locates saddle points along ridges within a digital elevation model (DEM).

wbt_max_upslope_flowpath_length()

Max upslope flowpath length Measures the maximum length of all upslope flowpaths draining each grid cell.

wbt_max_upslope_value()

Max upslope value This tool calculates the maximum upslope value from an input values raster along flowpaths.

wbt_md_inf_flow_accumulation()

Md inf flow accumulation Calculates an FD8 flow accumulation raster from an input DEM.

wbt_num_inflowing_neighbours()

Num inflowing neighbours Computes the number of inflowing neighbours to each cell in an input DEM based on the D8 algorithm.

wbt_qin_flow_accumulation()

Qin flow accumulation This tool calculates Qin et al. (2007) flow accumulation.

wbt_quinn_flow_accumulation()

Quinn flow accumulation This tool calculates Quinn et al. (1995) flow accumulation.

wbt_raise_walls()

Raise walls Raises walls in a DEM along a line or around a polygon, e.g. a watershed.

wbt_rho8_flow_accumulation()

Rho8 flow accumulation This tool calculates Fairfield and Leymarie (1991) flow accumulation.

wbt_rho8_pointer()

Rho8 pointer Calculates a stochastic Rho8 flow pointer raster from an input DEM.

wbt_sink()

Sink Identifies the depressions in a DEM, giving each feature a unique identifier.

wbt_snap_pour_points()

Snap pour points Moves outlet points used to specify points of interest in a watershedding operation to the cell with the highest flow accumulation in its neighbourhood.

wbt_stochastic_depression_analysis()

Stochastic depression analysis Performs a stochastic analysis of depressions within a DEM.

wbt_strahler_order_basins()

Strahler order basins Identifies Strahler-order basins from an input stream network.

wbt_subbasins()

Subbasins Identifies the catchments, or sub-basin, draining to each link in a stream network.

wbt_trace_downslope_flowpaths()

Trace downslope flowpaths Traces downslope flowpaths from one or more target sites (i.e. seed points).

wbt_unnest_basins()

Unnest basins Extract whole watersheds for a set of outlet points.

wbt_upslope_depression_storage()

Upslope depression storage Estimates the average upslope depression storage depth.

wbt_watershed()

Watershed Identifies the watershed, or drainage basin, draining to a set of target cells.

Image Processing

wbt_change_vector_analysis()

Change vector analysis Performs a change vector analysis on a two-date multi-spectral dataset.

wbt_closing()

Closing A closing is a mathematical morphology operation involving an erosion (min filter) of a dilation (max filter) set.

wbt_create_colour_composite()

Create colour composite Creates a colour-composite image from three bands of multispectral imagery.

wbt_flip_image()

Flip image Reflects an image in the vertical or horizontal axis.

wbt_ihs_to_rgb()

Ihs to rgb Converts intensity, hue, and saturation (IHS) images into red, green, and blue (RGB) images.

wbt_image_slider()

Image slider This tool creates an image slider from two input images.

wbt_image_stack_profile()

Image stack profile Plots an image stack profile (i.e. signature) for a set of points and multispectral images.

wbt_integral_image()

Integral image Transforms an input image (summed area table) into its integral image equivalent.

wbt_line_thinning()

Line thinning Performs line thinning a on Boolean raster image; intended to be used with the RemoveSpurs tool.

wbt_mosaic()

Mosaic Mosaics two or more images together.

wbt_mosaic_with_feathering()

Mosaic with feathering Mosaics two images together using a feathering technique in overlapping areas to reduce edge-effects.

wbt_normalized_difference_index()

Normalized difference index Calculate a normalized-difference index (NDI) from two bands of multispectral image data.

wbt_opening()

Opening An opening is a mathematical morphology operation involving a dilation (max filter) of an erosion (min filter) set.

wbt_remove_spurs()

Remove spurs Removes the spurs (pruning operation) from a Boolean line image; intended to be used on the output of the LineThinning tool.

wbt_resample()

Resample Resamples one or more input images into a destination image.

wbt_rgb_to_ihs()

Rgb to ihs Converts red, green, and blue (RGB) images into intensity, hue, and saturation (IHS) images.

wbt_split_colour_composite()

Split colour composite This tool splits an RGB colour composite image into separate multispectral images.

wbt_thicken_raster_line()

Thicken raster line Thickens single-cell wide lines within a raster image.

wbt_tophat_transform()

Tophat transform Performs either a white or black top-hat transform on an input image.

wbt_write_function_memory_insertion()

Write function memory insertion Performs a write function memory insertion for single-band multi-date change detection.

Image Processing (Classification)

wbt_evaluate_training_sites()

Evaluate training sites This tool can be used to inspect the overlap in spectral signatures of training sites for various classes.

wbt_generalize_classified_raster()

Generalize classified raster Generalizes a raster containing class or object features by removing small features.

wbt_generalize_with_similarity()

Generalize with similarity Generalizes a raster containing class or object features by removing small features using similarity criteria of neighbouring features.

wbt_image_segmentation()

Image segmentation Performs a region-growing based segmentation on a set of multi-spectral images.

wbt_min_dist_classification()

Min dist classification Performs a supervised minimum-distance classification using training site polygons and multi-spectral images.

wbt_parallelepiped_classification()

Parallelepiped classification Performs a supervised parallelepiped classification using training site polygons and multi-spectral images.

Image Processing (Filters)

wbt_adaptive_filter()

Adaptive filter Performs an adaptive filter on an image.

wbt_bilateral_filter()

Bilateral filter A bilateral filter is an edge-preserving smoothing filter introduced by Tomasi and Manduchi (1998).

wbt_canny_edge_detection()

Canny edge detection This tool performs a Canny edge-detection filter on an input image.

wbt_conservative_smoothing_filter()

Conservative smoothing filter Performs a conservative-smoothing filter on an image.

wbt_corner_detection()

Corner detection Identifies corner patterns in boolean images using hit-and-miss pattern matching.

wbt_diff_of_gaussian_filter()

Diff of gaussian filter Performs a Difference of Gaussian (DoG) filter on an image.

wbt_diversity_filter()

Diversity filter Assigns each cell in the output grid the number of different values in a moving window centred on each grid cell in the input raster.

wbt_edge_preserving_mean_filter()

Edge preserving mean filter Performs a simple edge-preserving mean filter on an input image.

wbt_emboss_filter()

Emboss filter Performs an emboss filter on an image, similar to a hillshade operation.

wbt_fast_almost_gaussian_filter()

Fast almost gaussian filter Performs a fast approximate Gaussian filter on an image.

wbt_gaussian_filter()

Gaussian filter Performs a Gaussian filter on an image.

wbt_high_pass_bilateral_filter()

High pass bilateral filter Performs a high-pass bilateral filter, by differencing an input image by the bilateral filter by Tomasi and Manduchi (1998).

wbt_high_pass_filter()

High pass filter Performs a high-pass filter on an input image.

wbt_high_pass_median_filter()

High pass median filter Performs a high pass median filter on an input image.

wbt_k_nearest_mean_filter()

K nearest mean filter A k-nearest mean filter is a type of edge-preserving smoothing filter.

wbt_laplacian_filter()

Laplacian filter Performs a Laplacian filter on an image.

wbt_laplacian_of_gaussian_filter()

Laplacian of gaussian filter Performs a Laplacian-of-Gaussian (LoG) filter on an image.

wbt_lee_sigma_filter()

Lee sigma filter Performs a Lee (Sigma) smoothing filter on an image.

wbt_line_detection_filter()

Line detection filter Performs a line-detection filter on an image.

wbt_majority_filter()

Majority filter Assigns each cell in the output grid the most frequently occurring value (mode) in a moving window centred on each grid cell in the input raster.

wbt_maximum_filter()

Maximum filter Assigns each cell in the output grid the maximum value in a moving window centred on each grid cell in the input raster.

wbt_mean_filter()

Mean filter Performs a mean filter (low-pass filter) on an input image.

wbt_median_filter()

Median filter Performs a median filter on an input image.

wbt_minimum_filter()

Minimum filter Assigns each cell in the output grid the minimum value in a moving window centred on each grid cell in the input raster.

wbt_olympic_filter()

Olympic filter Performs an olympic smoothing filter on an image.

wbt_percentile_filter()

Percentile filter Performs a percentile filter on an input image.

wbt_prewitt_filter()

Prewitt filter Performs a Prewitt edge-detection filter on an image.

wbt_range_filter()

Range filter Assigns each cell in the output grid the range of values in a moving window centred on each grid cell in the input raster.

wbt_roberts_cross_filter()

Roberts cross filter Performs a Robert's cross edge-detection filter on an image.

wbt_scharr_filter()

Scharr filter Performs a Scharr edge-detection filter on an image.

wbt_sobel_filter()

Sobel filter Performs a Sobel edge-detection filter on an image.

wbt_standard_deviation_filter()

Standard deviation filter Assigns each cell in the output grid the standard deviation of values in a moving window centred on each grid cell in the input raster.

wbt_total_filter()

Total filter Performs a total filter on an input image.

wbt_unsharp_masking()

Unsharp masking An image sharpening technique that enhances edges.

wbt_user_defined_weights_filter()

User ined weights filter Performs a user-defined weights filter on an image.

Image Processing (Enhancement)

wbt_balance_contrast_enhancement()

Balance contrast enhancement Performs a balance contrast enhancement on a colour-composite image of multispectral data.

wbt_correct_vignetting()

Correct vignetting Corrects the darkening of images towards corners.

wbt_direct_decorrelation_stretch()

Direct decorrelation stretch Performs a direct decorrelation stretch enhancement on a colour-composite image of multispectral data.

wbt_gamma_correction()

Gamma correction Performs a gamma correction on an input images.

wbt_gaussian_contrast_stretch()

Gaussian contrast stretch Performs a Gaussian contrast stretch on input images.

wbt_histogram_equalization()

Histogram equalization Performs a histogram equalization contrast enhancement on an image.

wbt_histogram_matching()

Histogram matching Alters the statistical distribution of a raster image matching it to a specified PDF.

wbt_histogram_matching_two_images()

Histogram matching two images This tool alters the cumulative distribution function of a raster image to that of another image.

wbt_min_max_contrast_stretch()

Min max contrast stretch Performs a min-max contrast stretch on an input greytone image.

wbt_panchromatic_sharpening()

Panchromatic sharpening Increases the spatial resolution of image data by combining multispectral bands with panchromatic data.

wbt_percentage_contrast_stretch()

Percentage contrast stretch Performs a percentage linear contrast stretch on input images.

wbt_piecewise_contrast_stretch()

Piecewise contrast stretch Performs a piecewise contrast stretch on an input image.

wbt_sigmoidal_contrast_stretch()

Sigmoidal contrast stretch Performs a sigmoidal contrast stretch on input images.

wbt_standard_deviation_contrast_stretch()

Standard deviation contrast stretch Performs a standard-deviation contrast stretch on input images.

LiDAR

wbt_ascii_to_las()

Ascii to las Converts one or more ASCII files containing LiDAR points into LAS files.

wbt_classify_buildings_in_lidar()

Classify buildings in lidar Reclassifies a LiDAR points that lie within vector building footprints.

wbt_classify_lidar()

Classify lidar Classify points within a LiDAR point cloud based on point properties.

wbt_classify_overlap_points()

Classify overlap points Classifies or filters LAS points in regions of overlapping flight lines.

wbt_clip_lidar_to_polygon()

Clip lidar to polygon Clips a LiDAR point cloud to a vector polygon or polygons.

wbt_colourize_based_on_class()

Colourize based on class Sets the RGB values of a LiDAR point cloud based on the point classification values.

wbt_colourize_based_on_point_returns()

Colourize based on point returns Sets the RGB values of a LiDAR point cloud based on the point returns.

wbt_erase_polygon_from_lidar()

Erase polygon from lidar Erases (cuts out) a vector polygon or polygons from a LiDAR point cloud.

wbt_filter_lidar()

Filter lidar Filters points within a LiDAR point cloud based on point properties.

wbt_filter_lidar_classes()

Filter lidar classes Removes points in a LAS file with certain specified class values.

wbt_filter_lidar_scan_angles()

Filter lidar scan angles Removes points in a LAS file with scan angles greater than a threshold.

wbt_find_flightline_edge_points()

Find flightline edge points Identifies points along a flightline's edge in a LAS file.

wbt_flightline_overlap()

Flightline overlap Reads a LiDAR (LAS) point file and outputs a raster containing the number of overlapping flight-lines in each grid cell.

wbt_height_above_ground()

Height above ground Normalizes a LiDAR point cloud, providing the height above the nearest ground-classified point.

wbt_las_to_ascii()

Las to ascii Converts one or more LAS files into ASCII text files.

wbt_las_to_laz()

Las to laz This tool converts one or more LAS files into the LAZ format.

wbt_las_to_multipoint_shapefile()

Las to multipoint shapefile Converts one or more LAS files into MultipointZ vector Shapefiles. When the input parameter is not specified, the tool grids all LAS files contained within the working directory.

wbt_las_to_shapefile()

Las to shapefile Converts one or more LAS files into a vector Shapefile of POINT ShapeType.

wbt_las_to_zlidar()

Las to zlidar Converts one or more LAS files into the zlidar compressed LiDAR data format.

wbt_laz_to_las()

Laz to las This tool converts one or more LAZ files into the LAS format.

wbt_lidar_block_maximum()

Lidar block maximum Creates a block-maximum raster from an input LAS file. When the input/output parameters are not specified, the tool grids all LAS files contained within the working directory.

wbt_lidar_block_minimum()

Lidar block minimum Creates a block-minimum raster from an input LAS file. When the input/output parameters are not specified, the tool grids all LAS files contained within the working directory.

wbt_lidar_classify_subset()

Lidar classify subset Classifies the values in one LiDAR point cloud that correspond with points in a subset cloud.

wbt_lidar_colourize()

Lidar colourize Adds the red-green-blue colour fields of a LiDAR (LAS) file based on an input image.

wbt_lidar_contour()

Lidar contour This tool creates a vector contour coverage from an input LiDAR point file.

wbt_lidar_digital_surface_model()

Lidar digital surface model Creates a top-surface digital surface model (DSM) from a LiDAR point cloud.

wbt_lidar_eigenvalue_features()

Lidar eigenvalue features Calculate eigenvalue-based metrics from a LiDAR point cloud.

wbt_lidar_elevation_slice()

Lidar elevation slice Outputs all of the points within a LiDAR (LAS) point file that lie between a specified elevation range.

wbt_lidar_ground_point_filter()

Lidar ground point filter Identifies ground points within LiDAR dataset using a slope-based method.

wbt_lidar_hex_binning()

Lidar hex binning Hex-bins a set of LiDAR points.

wbt_lidar_hillshade()

Lidar hillshade Calculates a hillshade value for points within a LAS file and stores these data in the RGB field.

wbt_lidar_histogram()

Lidar histogram Creates a histogram of LiDAR data.

wbt_lidar_idw_interpolation()

Lidar idw interpolation Interpolates LAS files using an inverse-distance weighted (IDW) scheme. When the input/output parameters are not specified, the tool interpolates all LAS files contained within the working directory.

wbt_lidar_info()

Lidar info Prints information about a LiDAR (LAS) dataset, including header, point return frequency, and classification data and information about the variable length records (VLRs) and geokeys.

wbt_lidar_join()

Lidar join Joins multiple LiDAR (LAS) files into a single LAS file.

wbt_lidar_kappa_index()

Lidar kappa index Performs a kappa index of agreement (KIA) analysis on the classifications of two LAS files.

wbt_lidar_nearest_neighbour_gridding()

Lidar nearest neighbour gridding Grids LiDAR files using nearest-neighbour scheme. When the input/output parameters are not specified, the tool grids all LAS files contained within the working directory.

wbt_lidar_point_density()

Lidar point density Calculates the spatial pattern of point density for a LiDAR data set. When the input/output parameters are not specified, the tool grids all LAS files contained within the working directory.

wbt_lidar_point_return_analysis()

Lidar point return analysis This tool performs a quality control check on the return values of points in a LiDAR file.

wbt_lidar_point_stats()

Lidar point stats Creates several rasters summarizing the distribution of LAS point data. When the input/output parameters are not specified, the tool works on all LAS files contained within the working directory.

wbt_lidar_ransac_planes()

Lidar ransac planes Performs a RANSAC analysis to identify points within a LiDAR point cloud that belong to linear planes.

wbt_lidar_rbf_interpolation()

Lidar rbf interpolation Interpolates LAS files using a radial basis function (RBF) scheme. When the input/output parameters are not specified, the tool interpolates all LAS files contained within the working directory.

wbt_lidar_remove_duplicates()

Lidar remove duplicates Removes duplicate points from a LiDAR data set.

wbt_lidar_remove_outliers()

Lidar remove outliers Removes outliers (high and low points) in a LiDAR point cloud.

wbt_lidar_rooftop_analysis()

Lidar rooftop analysis Identifies roof segments in a LiDAR point cloud.

wbt_lidar_segmentation()

Lidar segmentation Segments a LiDAR point cloud based on differences in the orientation of fitted planar surfaces and point proximity.

wbt_lidar_segmentation_based_filter()

Lidar segmentation based filter Identifies ground points within LiDAR point clouds using a segmentation based approach.

wbt_lidar_shift()

Lidar shift Shifts the x,y,z coordinates of a LiDAR file.

wbt_lidar_sibson_interpolation()

Lidar sibson interpolation This tool interpolates one or more LiDAR tiles using Sibson's natural neighbour method.

wbt_lidar_sort_by_time()

Lidar sort by time This tool sorts the points in a LiDAR file by the GPS time.

wbt_lidar_thin()

Lidar thin Thins a LiDAR point cloud, reducing point density.

wbt_lidar_thin_high_density()

Lidar thin high density Thins points from high density areas within a LiDAR point cloud.

wbt_lidar_tile()

Lidar tile Tiles a LiDAR LAS file into multiple LAS files.

wbt_lidar_tile_footprint()

Lidar tile footprint Creates a vector polygon of the convex hull of a LiDAR point cloud. When the input/output parameters are not specified, the tool works with all LAS files contained within the working directory.

wbt_lidar_tin_gridding()

Lidar tin gridding Creates a raster grid based on a Delaunay triangular irregular network (TIN) fitted to LiDAR points.

wbt_lidar_tophat_transform()

Lidar tophat transform Performs a white top-hat transform on a Lidar dataset; as an estimate of height above ground, this is useful for modelling the vegetation canopy.

wbt_modify_lidar()

Modify lidar Modify points within a LiDAR point cloud based on point properties.

wbt_normal_vectors()

Normal vectors Calculates normal vectors for points within a LAS file and stores these data (XYZ vector components) in the RGB field.

wbt_recover_flightline_info()

Recover flightline info Associates LiDAR points by their flightlines.

wbt_select_tiles_by_polygon()

Select tiles by polygon Copies LiDAR tiles overlapping with a polygon into an output directory.

wbt_sort_lidar()

Sort lidar Sorts LiDAR points based on their properties.

wbt_split_lidar()

Split lidar Splits LiDAR points up into a series of new files based on their properties.

wbt_zlidar_to_las()

Zlidar to las Converts one or more zlidar files into the LAS data format.

Machine Learning

wbt_dbscan()

Dbscan Performs a DBSCAN-based unsupervised clustering operation.

wbt_k_means_clustering()

K means clustering Performs a k-means clustering operation on a multi-spectral dataset.

wbt_knn_classification()

Knn classification Performs a supervised k-nearest neighbour classification using training site polygons/points and predictor rasters.

wbt_knn_regression()

Knn regression Performs a supervised k-nearest neighbour regression using training site points and predictor rasters.

wbt_logistic_regression()

Logistic regression Performs a logistic regression analysis using training site polygons/points and predictor rasters.

wbt_modified_k_means_clustering()

Modified k means clustering Performs a modified k-means clustering operation on a multi-spectral dataset.

wbt_random_forest_classification()

Random forest classification Performs a supervised random forest classification using training site polygons/points and predictor rasters.

wbt_random_forest_regression()

Random forest regression Performs a random forest regression analysis using training site data and predictor rasters.

wbt_svm_classification()

Svm classification Performs an SVM binary classification using training site polygons/points and multiple input images.

wbt_svm_regression()

Svm regression Performs a supervised SVM regression analysis using training site points and predictor rasters.

Math and Statistics

wbt_absolute_value()

Absolute value Calculates the absolute value of every cell in a raster.

wbt_add()

Add Performs an addition operation on two rasters or a raster and a constant value.

wbt_and()

And Performs a logical AND operator on two Boolean raster images.

wbt_anova()

Anova Performs an analysis of variance (ANOVA) test on a raster dataset.

wbt_arc_cos()

Arc cos Returns the inverse cosine (arccos) of each values in a raster.

wbt_arc_sin()

Arc sin Returns the inverse sine (arcsin) of each values in a raster.

wbt_arc_tan()

Arc tan Returns the inverse tangent (arctan) of each values in a raster.

wbt_arcosh()

Arcosh Returns the inverse hyperbolic cosine (arcosh) of each values in a raster.

wbt_arsinh()

Arsinh Returns the inverse hyperbolic sine (arsinh) of each values in a raster.

wbt_artanh()

Artanh Returns the inverse hyperbolic tangent (arctanh) of each values in a raster.

wbt_atan2()

Atan2 Returns the 2-argument inverse tangent (atan2).

wbt_attribute_correlation()

Attribute correlation Performs a correlation analysis on attribute fields from a vector database.

wbt_attribute_correlation_neighbourhood_analysis()

Attribute correlation neighbourhood analysis Performs a correlation on two input vector attributes within a neighbourhood search windows.

wbt_attribute_histogram()

Attribute histogram Creates a histogram for the field values of a vector's attribute table.

wbt_attribute_scattergram()

Attribute scattergram Creates a scattergram for two field values of a vector's attribute table.

wbt_ceil()

Ceil Returns the smallest (closest to negative infinity) value that is greater than or equal to the values in a raster.

wbt_conditional_evaluation()

Conditional evaluation This tool performs a conditional evaluation (if-then-else) operation on a raster.

wbt_conditioned_latin_hypercube()

Conditioned latin hypercube Implements conditioned Latin Hypercube sampling.

wbt_cos()

Cos Returns the cosine (cos) of each values in a raster.

wbt_cosh()

Cosh Returns the hyperbolic cosine (cosh) of each values in a raster.

wbt_crispness_index()

Crispness index Calculates the Crispness Index, which is used to quantify how crisp (or conversely how fuzzy) a probability image is.

wbt_cross_tabulation()

Cross tabulation Performs a cross-tabulation on two categorical images.

wbt_cumulative_distribution()

Cumulative distribution Converts a raster image to its cumulative distribution function.

wbt_decrement()

Decrement Decreases the values of each grid cell in an input raster by 1.0 (see also InPlaceSubtract).

wbt_divide()

Divide Performs a division operation on two rasters or a raster and a constant value.

wbt_equal_to()

Equal to Performs a equal-to comparison operation on two rasters or a raster and a constant value.

wbt_exp()

Exp Returns the exponential (base e) of values in a raster.

wbt_exp2()

Exp2 Returns the exponential (base 2) of values in a raster.

wbt_floor()

Floor Returns the largest (closest to positive infinity) value that is less than or equal to the values in a raster.

wbt_greater_than()

Greater than Performs a greater-than comparison operation on two rasters or a raster and a constant value.

wbt_image_autocorrelation()

Image autocorrelation Performs Moran's I analysis on two or more input images.

wbt_image_correlation()

Image correlation Performs image correlation on two or more input images.

wbt_image_correlation_neighbourhood_analysis()

Image correlation neighbourhood analysis Performs image correlation on two input images neighbourhood search windows.

wbt_image_regression()

Image regression Performs image regression analysis on two input images.

wbt_in_place_add()

In place add Performs an in-place addition operation (input1 += input2).

wbt_in_place_divide()

In place divide Performs an in-place division operation (input1 /= input2).

wbt_in_place_multiply()

In place multiply Performs an in-place multiplication operation (input1 *= input2).

wbt_in_place_subtract()

In place subtract Performs an in-place subtraction operation (input1 -= input2).

wbt_increment()

Increment Increases the values of each grid cell in an input raster by 1.0. (see also InPlaceAdd).

wbt_integer_division()

Integer division Performs an integer division operation on two rasters or a raster and a constant value.

wbt_inverse_principal_component_analysis()

Inverse principal component analysis This tool performs an inverse principal component analysis on a series of input component images.

wbt_is_no_data()

Is no data Identifies NoData valued pixels in an image.

wbt_kappa_index()

Kappa index Performs a kappa index of agreement (KIA) analysis on two categorical raster files.

wbt_ks_test_for_normality()

Ks test for normality Evaluates whether the values in a raster are normally distributed.

wbt_less_than()

Less than Performs a less-than comparison operation on two rasters or a raster and a constant value.

wbt_list_unique_values()

List unique values Lists the unique values contained in a field within a vector's attribute table.

wbt_ln()

Ln Returns the natural logarithm of values in a raster.

wbt_log10()

Log10 Returns the base-10 logarithm of values in a raster.

wbt_log2()

Log2 Returns the base-2 logarithm of values in a raster.

wbt_max()

Max Performs a MAX operation on two rasters or a raster and a constant value.

wbt_min()

Min Performs a MIN operation on two rasters or a raster and a constant value.

wbt_modulo()

Modulo Performs a modulo operation on two rasters or a raster and a constant value.

wbt_multiply()

Multiply Performs a multiplication operation on two rasters or a raster and a constant value.

wbt_negate()

Negate Changes the sign of values in a raster or the 0-1 values of a Boolean raster.

wbt_not()

Not Performs a logical NOT operator on two Boolean raster images.

wbt_not_equal_to()

Not equal to Performs a not-equal-to comparison operation on two rasters or a raster and a constant value.

wbt_or()

Or Performs a logical OR operator on two Boolean raster images.

wbt_paired_sample_t_test()

Paired sample t test Performs a 2-sample K-S test for significant differences on two input rasters.

wbt_phi_coefficient()

Phi coefficient This tool performs a binary classification accuracy assessment.

wbt_power()

Power Raises the values in grid cells of one rasters, or a constant value, by values in another raster or constant value.

wbt_principal_component_analysis()

Principal component analysis Performs a principal component analysis (PCA) on a multi-spectral dataset.

wbt_quantiles()

Quantiles Transforms raster values into quantiles.

wbt_random_field()

Random field Creates an image containing random values.

wbt_random_sample()

Random sample Creates an image containing randomly located sample grid cells with unique IDs.

wbt_raster_calculator()

Raster calculator This tool performs a complex mathematical operations on one or more input raster images on a cell-to-cell basis.

wbt_raster_histogram()

Raster histogram Creates a histogram from raster values.

wbt_raster_summary_stats()

Raster summary stats Measures a rasters min, max, average, standard deviation, num. non-nodata cells, and total.

wbt_reciprocal()

Reciprocal Returns the reciprocal (i.e. 1 / z) of values in a raster.

wbt_rescale_value_range()

Rescale value range Performs a min-max contrast stretch on an input greytone image.

wbt_root_mean_square_error()

Root mean square error Calculates the RMSE and other accuracy statistics.

wbt_round()

Round Rounds the values in an input raster to the nearest integer value.

wbt_sin()

Sin Returns the sine (sin) of each values in a raster.

wbt_sinh()

Sinh Returns the hyperbolic sine (sinh) of each values in a raster.

wbt_square()

Square Squares the values in a raster.

wbt_square_root()

Square root Returns the square root of the values in a raster.

wbt_subtract()

Subtract Performs a differencing operation on two rasters or a raster and a constant value.

wbt_tan()

Tan Returns the tangent (tan) of each values in a raster.

wbt_tanh()

Tanh Returns the hyperbolic tangent (tanh) of each values in a raster.

wbt_to_degrees()

To degrees Converts a raster from radians to degrees.

wbt_to_radians()

To radians Converts a raster from degrees to radians.

wbt_trend_surface()

Trend surface Estimates the trend surface of an input raster file.

wbt_trend_surface_vector_points()

Trend surface vector points Estimates a trend surface from vector points.

wbt_truncate()

Truncate Truncates the values in a raster to the desired number of decimal places.

wbt_turning_bands_simulation()

Turning bands simulation Creates an image containing random values based on a turning-bands simulation.

wbt_two_sample_ks_test()

Two sample ks test Performs a 2-sample K-S test for significant differences on two input rasters.

wbt_wilcoxon_signed_rank_test()

Wilcoxon signed rank test Performs a 2-sample K-S test for significant differences on two input rasters.

wbt_xor()

Xor Performs a logical XOR operator on two Boolean raster images.

wbt_z_scores()

Z scores Standardizes the values in an input raster by converting to z-scores.

wbt_zonal_statistics()

Zonal statistics Extracts descriptive statistics for a group of patches in a raster.

Precision Agriculture

wbt_reconcile_multiple_headers()

Reconcile multiple headers This tool adjusts the crop yield values for data sets collected with multiple headers or combines.

wbt_recreate_pass_lines()

Recreate pass lines This tool can be used to approximate the harvester pass lines from yield points.

wbt_remove_field_edge_points()

Remove field edge points This tool can be used to remove, or flag, most of the points along the edges from a crop yield data set.

wbt_yield_filter()

Yield filter Filters crop yield values of point data derived from combine harvester yield monitors.

wbt_yield_map()

Yield map This tool can be used to create a segmented-vector polygon yield map from a set of harvester points.

wbt_yield_normalization()

Yield normalization This tool can be used to normalize the yield points for a field.

Stream Network Analysis

wbt_distance_to_outlet()

Distance to outlet Calculates the distance of stream grid cells to the channel network outlet cell.

wbt_extract_streams()

Extract streams Extracts stream grid cells from a flow accumulation raster.

wbt_extract_valleys()

Extract valleys Identifies potential valley bottom grid cells based on local topolography alone.

wbt_farthest_channel_head()

Farthest channel head Calculates the distance to the furthest upstream channel head for each stream cell.

wbt_find_main_stem()

Find main stem Finds the main stem, based on stream lengths, of each stream network.

wbt_hack_stream_order()

Hack stream order Assigns the Hack stream order to each tributary in a stream network.

wbt_horton_stream_order()

Horton stream order Assigns the Horton stream order to each tributary in a stream network.

wbt_length_of_upstream_channels()

Length of upstream channels Calculates the total length of channels upstream.

wbt_long_profile()

Long profile Plots the stream longitudinal profiles for one or more rivers.

wbt_long_profile_from_points()

Long profile from points Plots the longitudinal profiles from flow-paths initiating from a set of vector points.

wbt_raster_streams_to_vector()

Raster streams to vector Converts a raster stream file into a vector file.

wbt_rasterize_streams()

Rasterize streams Rasterizes vector streams based on Lindsay (2016) method.

wbt_remove_short_streams()

Remove short streams Removes short first-order streams from a stream network.

wbt_repair_stream_vector_topology()

Repair stream vector topology This tool resolves topological errors and inconsistencies associated with digitized vector streams.

wbt_shreve_stream_magnitude()

Shreve stream magnitude Assigns the Shreve stream magnitude to each link in a stream network.

wbt_strahler_stream_order()

Strahler stream order Assigns the Strahler stream order to each link in a stream network.

wbt_stream_link_class()

Stream link class Identifies the exterior/interior links and nodes in a stream network.

wbt_stream_link_identifier()

Stream link identifier Assigns a unique identifier to each link in a stream network.

wbt_stream_link_length()

Stream link length Estimates the length of each link (or tributary) in a stream network.

wbt_stream_link_slope()

Stream link slope Estimates the average slope of each link (or tributary) in a stream network.

wbt_stream_slope_continuous()

Stream slope continuous Estimates the slope of each grid cell in a stream network.

wbt_topological_stream_order()

Topological stream order Assigns each link in a stream network its topological order.

wbt_tributary_identifier()

Tributary identifier Assigns a unique identifier to each tributary in a stream network.

wbt_vector_stream_network_analysis()

Vector stream network analysis This tool performs common stream network analysis operations on an input vector stream file.
